name: Do You Like Me?
description:
You are nothing. Nobody notices or cares about you. You will never achieve anything. Unless...
Why don't you try and take from those who already have so much? Build a new identity by combining those of others. Steal their body parts and create your very own. Then they'll have to notice you... and the others? Well guess it's their turn to feel like nothing.

This game was created during the Fall GameJam 2019 and has been polished since then but we are still trying to improve it.
We hope you enjoy playing & would be thankful for some comments!


Controls

Walk & Turn | WASD & MOUSE
Vision | SHIFT
Steal | HOLD LEFT MOUSE BUTTON
ESC | PAUSE


Credits

Tina Wolfrum || Game Design, Programming, Level Design

Teresa Wolfrum || Game Design, 2D Art, Animations

Sound provided by the following users of freesound.org:
